alert.note: Alert for Clark; Dallas; Grant; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 6:22PM CDT until June 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Grant County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 621 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Halfway, or 11 miles southwest of Arkadelphia, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Arkadelphia... Caddo Valley... Leola... Carthage... Prattsville... Okolona... Gum Springs in Clark County... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Halfway... Richwoods... Thiel... Dogwood... Donaldson... Lono... Tulip... Curtis... Dalark... Burtsell... Lower Lake Recreation Area... Manning... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
